No B.S. Recipes

I'm sure you've been there - looking up a quick recipe on your mobile device, only having to scroll through a 1500-word essay on how the recipe changed that blogger's life and oh by the way this post is sponsored by Koch Industries.

Enter No B.S. Recipes: great recipes, no bullshit.

Got a recipe?

Send me an email at ben@thelocust.org and I'll try it out!

Hey folks!

My name's Ben and you've just stumbled into No B.S. Recipes, a site with just great, tested recipes without preambles, backstories or affiliate advertising.

No B.S. Recipes is built on top of Chowdown, an open-source recipe system.
